product_name: Marmot Rincon Rain Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: When it comes to protection from the wet and cold, The Marmot Rincon rain jacket doesn't hold back. Waterproof and breathable nylon has you covered whenever you need it. Waterproof and breathable PreCip(R) material reduces condensation and that clammy feel for next-to-skin comfort. 100% taped seams seal out the elements. Attached adjustable hood tightens for snug fit and improved visibility. Two zippered hand pockets and one zippered chest pocket secure small essentials. Adustable rip-and-stick cuffs and drawcord at hem seal in warmth and ensure a snug fit. Marmot Rincon jacket features Angel-wing Movement(TM) sleeves for unrestricted arm motion so the jacket won't ride up. Closeout.
short_description: When it comes to protection from the wet and cold, The Marmot Rincon rain jacket doesn't hold back. Waterproof and breathable nylon has you covered whenever you need it.
